# t-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                          | Type      | Default        |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------ | --------- | -------------- |
| `direction`    | `direction`     | (optional) Slider direction          | `string`  | `'horizontal'` |
| `displayValue` | `display-value` | (optional) Slider display value      | `boolean` | `true`         |
| `fillColor`    | `fill-color`    | (optional) Slider track fill color   | `string`  | `'#409eff'`    |
| `max`          | `max`           | (optional) Slider range max value    | `number`  | `100`          |
| `min`          | `min`           | (optional) Slider range start value  | `number`  | `0`            |
| `trackColor`   | `track-color`   | (optional) Slider track runway color | `string`  | `'#e4e7ed'`    |
| `type`         | `type`          | (optional) Slider type               | `string`  | `'default'`    |
| `value`        | `value`         | (optional) Slider binding value      | `number`  | `0`            |

| Name                                           | Description                                                                                    |
| ---------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--slider--vertical-transform-origin`          | Transform origin of the slider vertical @Prop --slider__text-margin: Margin of the slider text |

| `--slider__input--default-thumb-background`    | Background of the slider input thumb                                                           |

| `--slider__input--square-thumb-border-radius`  | Border radius of the slider input square thumb                                                 |
| `--slider__input--square-thumb-height`         | Height of the slider input square thumb                                                        |

| `--slider__input-background`                   | Background of the slider input                                                                 |

| `--slider__input-height`                       | Height of the slider input                                                                     |
